name: blog-post-workflow
description: Allows you to show your latest blog posts on your github profile or project readme

scripts.test: npm run lint && start-server-and-test start-server http://localhost:8080 test-run
scripts.test-run-dist: DIST=true node test.js && diff test/Readme.md test/Readme.md.snap
scripts.test-dist: npm run lint && start-server-and-test start-server http://localhost:8080 test-run-dist

author: Gautam krishna R <r.gautamkrishna@gmail.com> (http://www.github.com/gautamkrishnar)
